line.text: Those lines that I before have writ do lie
line.meter: s s* s s* s s* s s* s s*

line.text: Even those that said I could not love you dearer
line.meter: s s* s s* s s* s s* s s*

line.text: Yet then my judgment knew no reason why
line.meter: s s* s s* s s* s s* s s*

line.text: My most full flame should afterwards burn clearer
line.meter: s s* s s* s s* s s* s s*

line.text: But reckoning time whose millioned accidents
line.meter: s s* s s* s s* s s* s s*

line.text: Creep in twixt vows and change decrees of kings
line.meter: s s* s s* s s* s s* s s*

line.text: Tan sacred beauty blunt the sharp intents
line.meter: s s* s s* s s* s s* s s*

line.text: Divert strong minds to the course of altring things
line.meter: s s* s s* s s* s s* s s*

line.text: Alas why fearing of time tyranny
line.meter: s s* s s* s s* s s* s s*

line.text: Might I not then say Now I love you best
line.meter: s s* s s* s s* s s* s s*

line.text: When I was certain oer incertainty
line.meter: s s* s s* s s* s s* s s*

line.text: Crowning the present doubting of the rest
line.meter: s s* s s* s s* s s* s s*

line.text: Love is a babe then might I not say so
line.meter: s s* s s* s s* s s* s s*

line.text: To give full growth to that which still doth grow
line.meter: s s* s s* s s* s s* s s*
